category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ShowUserDeclaredGeography
preference.preference_description: Controls the visibility of User Declared Geography field on the User Settings dialog's Login panel. Valid values are: * true: To make User Declared Geography field visible on the Login panel of User Settings dialog. This is the default value. * false: To hide User Declared Geography field on the Login panel of User Settings dialog.
